title: snow connection list | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Specifies the output format. Default: TABLE.
Displays log entries for log levels info and higher. Default: False.
Displays log entries for log levels debug and higher; debug logs contain additional information. Default: False.
Turns off intermediate output to console. Default: False.
Displays the help text for this command.

The snow connection list command lists the connections in your default config.toml file.
For more information, see Configuring Snowflake CLI and connecting to Snowflake.
